sentences.en: Baggage from flight AC 123 is on carousel number 4 AC.
sentences.cn: 123次班机的行李在4AC号行李传送带上.

sentences.en: Baggage from flight AC 123 is on carousel number 4 AC.
sentences.cn: 123次班机的行李在4AC号行李传送带上.

sentences.en: Carousel is one of the most cruel game in the world.
sentences.cn: 旋转木马残忍|旋转木马是世界上最残忍的游戏.

sentences.en: Did you know there is a lead horse on a carousel?
sentences.cn: 您知道旋转木马中有一匹领队马 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do not you think Carousel is a very cruel game?
sentences.cn: 3你不觉得旋转木马是一种很残忍的游戏 吗 ?

sentences.en: Excuse me . I couldn't find my luggage at the carousel.
sentences.cn: 抱歉,我在行李输送带那儿找不到我的行李.

sentences.en: I don't know what to say, my head's spinning like a carousel.
sentences.cn: 我和你在一起,就无法言语.我不知道说什么, 像是醉了.

sentences.en: My head's spinning like a carousel, so silently I pray.
sentences.cn: 脑筋好比旋转木马般转呐转呐, 我于是默默祈祷.

sentences.en: Riding on a carousel makes you feel dizzy.
Send slides in a round pre - loaded Kodak carousel slide tray.
sentences.cn: 将你的幻灯片预载在柯达幻灯片托盘内.

sentences.en: The baggage carousel has broken down.
This button came from the carousel where we found Briana.
sentences.cn: 这粒纽扣是从我们找到布瑞娜的地方找到的.

sentences.en: This simplified model of a carousel demonstrates this force.
sentences.cn: 这个旋球转盘的简化模型演示了这个力.

sentences.en: We have a print that puts you at the carousel.
sentences.cn: 我们在控制器上发现了你的指纹.

sentences.en: When they turn 30, they'll be summoned to Carousel.
sentences.cn: 当他们到了30岁时就被召唤到酒会上去.

trans.tran_en: the moving belt that you collect your bags from at an airport
